entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 8.
